description:
This task aims at designing a picture depicting the motto "Ending Poverty One Line Of Code At A Time". We're looking for hand-drawn pictures - creativity is the key.
Full screen : 1024 X 768
Widescreen : 1920 X 1080 ( Desktop wallpaper )
Mobile phone : 1080 X 1920
If you're using any third party images, please make sure they fall under the Creative Commons License. Any assets ( images, drawings, photos ) which are licensed under Creative Commons, must have proper Attribution. Share the .ai files you've designed in https://goo.gl/sGZKpt with the task mentor. Also, append your name to the submitted file so that we know who did the work.
name: Draw A Creative Picture Depicting Our Mifos Motto
